Pre-Game Insights: Shohei Ohtani is set to make his MLB post-season debut after seven seasons.
The Dodgers have the MVP trio of Ohtani, Mookie Betts, and Freddie Freeman.
San Diego Padres swept the Atlanta Braves in the wild-card round.
Yoshinobu Yamamoto and Jack Flaherty are the known variables for Games 1 and 2 for the Dodgers.
It'll be if other Padres offensive stars stay quiet, particularly Manny Machado, Jurickson Profar, and Xander Bogaerts.
Ohtani, Betts, and Freeman will be crucial for the Dodgers to prevent a repeat of the 2022 NLDS sweep.
